author: lveldere
body:
Hi all

4 new workflows are introduced,
FS PU steps got keys that are easier to read.

I only checked runTheMatrix -e -n for these new workflows.
I will run them tomorrow or the day after (traveling),
but I make the pr already now to keep the discussion going.
# What's new:

25207: fullsim neutrino gun, PU25
25400.1 fastsim ttbar 13 TeV, AVE10 no OOT PU, digi-reco mixing
25402: fastsim ttbar 13TeV, PU25, digi-reco mixing
25407: fastsim neutrino gun UP15, PU25, digi-reco mixing
# Older relevant workflows

25202: fullsim ttbar 13 TeV, PU25
25400: fastsim ttbar 13 TeV, AVE10, no OOT PU
# Comparisons for validation

I propose the following comparisons:

25202  vs 25402  
25207 vs 25407
(ie. nu-gun/ttbar, PU25 fast vs full)

25400 vs 25400.1
(ie fastsim ttbar, AVE10 no OOT PU, digireco mixing vs gen-mxing)
title: Fastsim new wf digirecomix
